import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/service/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'], }) export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit { data: any; constructor(private auth: AuthService, private router: Router) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getProfiler(); } getProfiler() { this.auth.getProfile().subscribe( (res) => { console.log(res); if (res.success) { this.data = res.data; } else { } }, (err) => { console.log(err); } ); } logout() { localStorage.clear(); this.router.navigate(['/dashboard']); } }
